bib.title: Ask friends for help: A collaborative query answering system
bib.author: Popowicz, Dominik and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Kozielski, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: The probability that we get help is greater if we ask a friend, rather than a stranger. On the basis of this sociological phenomenon, the innovative SocLaKE recommender system for query propagation in the social network was invented. In this paper, a general concept of the system as well as a discussion on various issues and challenges related to its application are presented.
bib.booktitle: International Conference on Cooperative Design, Visualization and Engineering
